description: The Local Governance & Communicty Development Programme-LGCDP

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
Systems, tools and strategies developed to enable communities and community organisations participate actively in local governance processess (CPAP output 2.1.5)

Increased capacity of citizens, communities and marginalized groups to assert their rights and hold local government accountable (CPAP Output 2.1.5)
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Increased capacity of Govt
